summary:
Based in the Netherlands as a Dutch citizen, and with over 20 years in the application development industry within various roles from Developer, to Architect, Consultant and Chief Technology Officer, I have spent my life trying to help business and IT connect by defining, designing, analyzing and architecting a variety of applications within both the on premise and cloud based architectural stacks. 

Together with teams and independently, I have assisted numerous clients identify their IT challenges, and architect suitable solutions to address these. I am a Solutions and Application Architect by heart still, bringing my years of practical experience into both practical solutions as well as strategic solutions. I believe in integration, generic design, reusability and cloud! I get my energy from seeing the Business and IT meet, understand each other, as well helping the teams deliver what business needs. 

I am a technologist by heart, and believe in the responsible usage of data and data driven architecture to drive business.

My focus areas include: 
- Consulting throughout the software application development lifecycle
- Working closely in a pre-sales/business development role
- Designing large scale, highly integrated solutions
- Mortgage, Pension and Financial services & Healthcare domain experience
- Forming close bonds as a trusted advisor to clients
- Entrepreneurial outlook and approach to problem solving and legacy renewal
- Preparation, Submission and Presentation of Tenders/Proposals/Solutions
- Engagement from CEO to Clerk, and from business to technology, whilst adapting the engagement accordingly
- Extracting As-Is processes whilst modeling To-Be scenarios taking into account cost of ownership, change management path and IT risk
- Technology agnostic, but with specific experience and focus on Microsoft Technologies & Azure Cloud
- Mobile, desktop, web and backend design
- Microsoft Certified Professional and Solution Designer, Scrum Master and Product Owner
- Building IT teams

school.name: University of South Africa/Universiteit van Suid-Afrika

company.name: University of South Africa/Universiteit van Suid-Afrika

profile_positions.description:
As Head of Technology at Salut, I work closely with the internal team to determine how we implement our innovative products and solutions in the market within the technical context. I fulfill the role of IT strategist, both internally and within the product lines, technical oversight, channel development, integration, Big Data and architectural guidance as well as the setup and management of our internal IT team. 

I am responsible for the technical roadmap, compliance and execution within Salut and our partners/suppliers. Part of my mandate when joining Salut was to fully internalise and build our IT team, migrate to our own technology stack and become fully independent. As Salut, we have a fully cloud hosted Platform as a Service product supporting multi-tenancy, multi-product mobile and web applications.
profile_positions.title: Chief Technology Officer

profile_positions.description: My role at Avanade is to help our clients design and implement the best of breed solutions to meet their complex IT Application needs, largely based upon the Microsoft Azure Cloud Stack. From bespoke solutions utilising the latest in cloud technology, through to complex and integrated enterprise systems. I focus on what the cloud, be it fully public or hybrid, can bring in terms of reliability, reusability, future readiness, cost effectivity and long term management. I focus predominately on the application landscape - providing the link between systems, and how data is consumed and interchanged between systems, providing a single version of the truth. I focus on application design and legacy application modernisation, in conjunction with a team of industry experts within Avanade.
profile_positions.title: Group Manager: Cloud Solutions Architect

profile_positions.description:
My role at Yellowtail was a multi-faceted role with a large focus on providing technical leadership and architectural design across our range of Financial services and products, with a specific focus on mortgages (providing fully automated and integrated mortgage solutions). I bring my 18+ years’ experience in the Software Development industry, and helped Yellowtail and their clients, work together to find the right solutions for specific business problems. I work across the board from the larger banks, pension funds, advisory companies amongst others.

My core technical skills lie in the architectural design of complex, highly integrated, data driven systems. We focus on delivering technology that is cloud focussed in addition to on premise, incorporating container based architecture. I have a strong focus on Webapi supporting RESTFul services on the backbone of MongoDB.

I assist Yellowtail within the Azure stack, to provide cloud based solutions using some of the latest features within Azure, such as Logic Apps, Azure Service Bus, WebAPI, Service Fabric, CosmosDB (unstructured documents), Azure functions, SQL Azure and others. 

I focus on Generics and how a data driven design can cater for a multitude of customer needs using a shared, configurable platform.
profile_positions.title: Principal Solutions Architecture Consultant

profile_positions.description: With almost 20 years experience in Software Development, I provide Solutions Architecture and Consulting Services to a variety of clients. As an experienced solutions architect and designer, I assist clients by defining, designing, analyzing and selling a variety of concepts and applications within both the desktop and mobile space, taking into account the various cloud services available. I assist clients identify their IT challenges, and designed suitable solutions to address these. I focus on maximising existing technology investment through integration and legacy renewal, as well as providing guidance and design for build or buy solutions. Whilst my key area of technical expertise are Microsoft related, I am technology agnostic when assisting clients maximise their value.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Solutions Architect and Application Development Consultant

company.name: Tax Relax in the Cloud Internet Storage

profile_positions.company: Tax Relax in the Cloud Internet Storage
profile_positions.description:
As an consultant to Tax Relax in the Cloud Internet Storage, my role was to provide consulting services with regards to scoping, designing and implementing a full, customized, document storage system on the Windows Azure stack that would cater for:

•	Tax Compliance with regards to document retention regulations in South Africa
•	Online signup and payment process (full integration with PayPal)
•	Integration with an SMS gateway and email gateway to deliver all automatic correspondence
•	Full document store with customized components for:
  o	  Storing
  o	  Uploading (using Dropzone.js)
  o	  Azure blob storage
  o	  Data driven document security, movement, copy
  o	  In built sharing
  o	  Retention rules and configuration
•	Scan from any TWAIN device within the browser
•	Responsive design
•	Full mobile suite to be released
•	Office 365 integration to be released

Windows Azure (Blob Storage, Hosted Application, SQL Azure), C#.NET, ASP.NET, DotCMIS, WebForms, SQL Server, TFS, JavaScript, JQuery, DropZone.js, Twitter Bootstrap, PayPal, SMS Gateway, SSL, SMTP, Dynamic Web Twain
profile_positions.title: Solutions Architect

profile_positions.description:
As an executive consultant to Christopher Finance, my role was to provide consulting services with regards to scoping, designing and implementing a full, customized, financial system based on the Windows Azure stack that would cater for:

•	Multiple Companies
•	Individual case management
•	Disbursements on a sub matter level
•	Full financial calculations including:
o	Facility budgets
o	Facility drawdowns (withdrawals)
o	Interest calculations on:
	Daily accrued capital costs
	Monthly and once off admin costs
o	Payment receipts
•	Reporting on a detailed level including:
o	Client Statements
o	Overview summary
o	Company financial status (income and interest)
o	Projected income and growth

Technologies: Windows Azure (Blob Storage, Hosted Application, SQL Azure),, C#.NET, ASP.NET, DotCMIS, WebForms, SQL Server, TFS, GitHub, JavaScript, JQuery, Reporting Services, Twitter Bootstrap
profile_positions.title: Solutions Architect

profile_positions.description: Part-time television producer for short and regular documentaries, director, producer, editor and presenter.
profile_positions.title: Part-Time Producer, Documentary Maker and Media Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As an executive consultant to firstcoast, my role was to provide consulting services with regards to:

•	Network and Security Setup
•	Cloud deployment for outsourced services (mail, hosting) using services such as Azure, Amazon EC2, Exchange in the cloud, Office365
•	Structuring and enabling a scrum based team, with the implementation of tools and processes
•	Product roadmap for paperfreeweb (www.paperfreeweb.com) - Based on Alfresco open source document management system
•	Development of Microsoft Office Plugins for Word, Excel, Powerpoint and Outlook – direct integration with Alfresco using DotCMIS
•	Development of Synchronization tools using DotCMIS to automate the upload and synchronisation of documents
•	Development of web based services and API’s for the logging of files and uploads
•	Management of external resources
•	Development of mobile services
•	Head of Implementation for roll out of paperfreeweb in the cloud for multiple clients
•	Scoping and business analysis for firstcoast’s clients to develop implementation, integration and requirements specifications
•	Manage implementation teams
•	Speaker and Trainer
•	Media, case studies, web and marketing material

Technologies:
Java, Alfresco, Amazon EC2, Windows Azure, C#.NET, ASP.NET, Office plugins, WCF, Android, iOS, Jira, ScrumDo, DotCMIS, WebForms, SQL Server, TFS, GitHub
profile_positions.title: Executive Consultant

profile_positions.description:
My initial appointment was as Technology Consultant for DVT. This was due to their remarkable growth to almost 400 people over ten years. As a software services and solutions company, leadership was required to manage technology and provide a streamlined offering within the organization as well as advising their clients. My role was more client facing with the focus on solutions architecture and advising on technology.

In addition I co-managed the finances, sales and marketing as well as media releases for this business unit (Technology, Solutions, Development) until my departure in August 2013. I assisted a variety of clients define solutions in the mobile, Business Intelligence and Integration space. As part of my media offering, I assisted DVT launch a YouTube channel to showcase their case studies and marketing material. I produced the material for the channel during my employment.

I still actively engage with DVT using their services and employees at clients where required.

Technologies:
ASP.NET, Java, C#.NET, VB.NET, WCF, SugarCRM, iOS, Android, PhoneGap, MVC, TFS, Mendix
profile_positions.title: Information Technology Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Initially I consulted to Business Connexion from early 2006 with the supply of development resources for projects as and when required through my company in JHB. Upon the sale of my shares in the business, I joined Business Connexion in JHB as an Advisory Consultant and Principle Solution Designer. I assisted management and the development team to analyse and design solutions for their clients within the application development space. Upon relocating to Cape Town, I was offered the position of Senior Services Manager: Application Development. My role was to establish and build the development capability in cape town as well as to establish relationships with the existing clients to enhance the services offering of Business Connexion in Cape Town. My role in management was diverse from managing the business unit in cape town, through to the sales and subsequent design of solutions. By December 2011 I wanted flexibility to pursue my part time production business but unfortunately my role was a fulltime one. I left BCX on good terms and continued to engage with them.

Technologies:
ASP.NET, Java, C#.NET, VB.NET, WCF, SugarCRM, iOS, Android, PhoneGap, MVC, TFS, Mendix

Core Focus Areas:
Technical Architecture Design
Business Management
Business Analysis
Business Requirements scoping
Training
Software development 
Scrum Methodology
System messaging
Integration
Database design (SQL Server / Oracle)
Data Warehousing
Warehouse reporting / analysis
Client liaison 
 - scoping / quoting / management
Project management 
Profitability analysis
Alignment with :
- Business processes
- Client architectural requirements
- Client business requirements
- Enterprise solution design
profile_positions.title: Senior Services Manager
